name: flutter-utils
title: Flutter Utils
description: Quick commands for Flutter: run, pub get, clean, analyze, test, build, doctor
author: ymunsch8

commands.name: flutter
commands.title: Flutter
commands.description: List Flutter actions and enter arguments

preferences.name: projectPath
preferences.title: Project Path
preferences.description: Absolute path to the Flutter project folder (optional). If empty, use a folder selected in Finder.

preferences.name: flutterSdkPath
preferences.title: Flutter SDK Path
preferences.description: Absolute path to the Flutter SDK root folder (containing bin)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the "prepublishOnly" script and rerun "npm publish" again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use "npm run publish" instead.

" && exit 1
